bt.data.file

Class OpenFileCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.data.file.OpenFileCache

  • public class OpenFileCache
extends Object
    This is an LRU cache for open files. It prevents having too many opened files by limiting the total possible opened while minimizing file open/close operation by keeping recently read/written files open.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpenFileCache(int maxOpenFiles)
      Construct an LRU cache for managing open files

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Flush all buffered data to the file system

      • existsOnFileSystem

        public boolean existsOnFileSystem(FileCacheKey key)
        Check if the the File exists on the file system. First checks if the file system exists in the cache. If yes, the file definitely exists and returns true. If not, it checks the filesystem if the file exists.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to check whether exists on the file system
        Returns:
        true if it exists on the filesystem, false otherwise

      • close

        public void close(FileCacheKey key)
           throws IOException
        Close the file associated with this cache key if it is open
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the file to close
        Throws:
        IOException - on failure to close

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close all open files in this storage system.
        Throws:
